reviews.review:
Good game! Loved how it looked, the music was incredible, and I actually really like the gameplay. The story.... was something else. I liked the beginning, I loved the middle, and the end sure did happen. Don't get me wrong, it was worth it as a whole, just a bit confusing. All in all, great game! 

TIP: getting the vigor upgrade Crows Trap Aid for Murder of Crows is a must imo.
Great BioShock game!

B.I провоцирует игрока на несерьезное к себе отношение. Кукольная, нарядная Колумбия, гротескные "враги",  анимешность и мимшность NPC Элизобеth.  Если поддаться этому мороку, весело мчаться сквозь игру постреливая и приколдовывая - в игру вы не играли.
oyun serisini fulden oynadım. Baya iyi kesinlikle indirimde alın.
Give it a shot, it's pretty good.

After, about 4 or 5 years of having this game in my library, I didnt' have time to finished it. Then, I decided to finish the game now, and I was blasted of how good this game is.
I really love this game, because it's all about gameplay, gameplay, and gameplay! especially about the gunplay, it's so satisfying to pop some enemies head with a wide selection of guns. The pacing is so good that you won't get bored from a phase to another. The writing is well-written, and all of the character is well-developed.
As a game artist myself, I found some really annoying UI feature. for example, the UI for shops are kinda confusing for me, because they didn't put catalogue for each needs and type of weapons, and also how the icons are kind of blend-in with each other. another thing is, I got really confused of how to differentiate between regular shop and vigors upgrade shop. aren't they the same looking automaton?
But, those aren't that big of an issue. The thing is the game is a balance between, awesome gameplay, good writing, and beautiful game art/design! This game is a must!
Bioshock Infinite! 9.5/10!

Очень унылая коридорная боевка - большинство плазмидов абсолютно юзлесс, оружие кот наплакал, даже при полной прокачке стволы просто бесполезные пукалки, последний боссфайт просто спам из местного аналога "большого папочки" и нпс. Типичное мыльное кинцо для консольщиков, Пройти один раз и забыть - реиграбельность нулевая.

Simplesmente não tem o que dizer desse jogo. Serio bioshock infinite tem uma historia absurda, uma gameplay muito divertida envolvendo os trilhos da cidade voadora, e a principio pode assustar os jogadores dos primeiros bioshock's por, não ser ambientado em rapture ou por ser mais caro que os outros jogos da franquia, mas esse jogo vale cada centavo(apesar de eu particularmente achar melhor esperar uma promoção, como eu mesmo fiz. Mas se você quer muito jogar o jogo e tem dinheiro, compre ele normalmente) serio se você não achar esse jogo bom, você é bizarro.

P.S: Se você puder compre a dlc burial at sea, principalmente se você ja tiver jogado os primeiros jogos de bioshock, ja que ela fecha a historia de bioshock 1, com a de bioshock infinite.

Bioshock infinite tem uma gameplay divertida, uma historia muito muito boa, uma trilha sonora bem trabalhada, um misterio que vai deixar você cada vez mais interessado na historia, uma variedade de inimigos, armas e poderes, e como todo bioshock uma ambientação absurda.

nota geral: 10/10
游戏是好游戏，就是我晕3D每次只能坚持不到半个点
真不愧是神作，建议至少玩完生化奇兵1再来玩无限
还可以 低配电脑  体验极佳

我在购买这款游戏之前曾经玩了一遍盗版的，当发现steam上有三部曲捆绑包并且打折的时候我就赶紧补票了。首先，这款游戏真是是十分推荐，而且它也无愧于游戏界第九艺术之称。我在第一次通关此游戏后可以说对游戏的剧情并不了解，于是我去小破站上搜索了剧情解读，通过观看近2小时的解读（还看了好几遍，原谅我脑子转不过来弯），我可以说是比较透彻的了解这游戏的前因后果，带着这份理解，我有重新开了一个存档，并且这次的游戏中我更加注意对游戏细节处的留意，从而我也更一步确定了这游戏的价值，它真的太棒了！！！所以兄弟们，能入就入吧，这游戏绝对值！

I loved this game when it game out 8 years ago but now I don’t feel the same way about it, despite Elizabeth being one of my favorite characters.
Gameplay is a step backwards compared to the previous two titles.  Columbia adds some verticality to combat but it relies on a constant formula of walk down a hall until you get an area to fight bad guys.  Rinse and repeat.  The new vigors are less interesting than plasmids were and given that the game relies on a run and gun style you’ll never be using their trap capabilities.  You are also limited to two guns at any time and instead of different ammo each gun just has two slightly different versions.
The game is also very short.  The main game + both Burial at Sea episodes was just barely longer than the 1st Bioshock and about three hours shorter than the 2nd and its DLC.  If you go back and watch the old trailers you’ll see a lot of material was cut and it shows at times.
I was also frustrated by the absence of standard quality of life and accessibility features.  You can’t save anywhere, instead the game autosaves when you go to a new area.  It doesn’t even have a time based autosave.  Voxophones don’t have subtitles and you no longer have a map so it can be easy to miss areas when you are exploring. 
I do like the story and Elizabeth’s character arc, but if that’s all you are interested in it’s a better use of your time to watch a Let’s Play.

de los mejores juegos de la maldit4 historia me c4g0 en diooooooo
El final es una maravilla

Este juego es una maravilla.
Graficamente es impresionante, el entorno muy detallado.
La ambientación atrapante y envolvente. Lo mejor de la música es que cambia cuando has acabado con todos los enemigos.
La historia... de las mejores que he jugado en un par de años. Como ver una película que da un giro argumental y te deja con el culo torcido. Increible.

Una joya que debes tener y jugar si o si, no hay otra opcion.

That game might look outdated, yes. With some clunky combat mechanics, pretty linear gameplay, not up to date textures, scripted events and not so vast surroundings to explore or wonder about. But.
That game has a soul.
And I'd put that above all other modern qualities: great visual, decent shooting or big open world (with big open ingame shop). Bioshock Infinite is a classic, story driven adventure and if you have not played it yet -- jump in and take a ride. Skyline is always ready.
有一说一，的确是好玩。我爱伊丽莎白
Bioshock Infinite possui uma gameplay incrível, história de explodir a cabeça, e poderes criativos. Recomendo!
Will the circle be unbroken.

hikayesi dillere destan ama herkes anlayamayabilir biraz karışık ve pek iyi anlatılmamış. Hikayesini anlayınca gercekten ağızda tadı mükemmel oluyor. Oyunda yak karakterlere pek önem verilmemiş. Eski Bioshock oyunlarınıda oynadım ama bunu onlardan daha çok beğendim. bir Rapture şehri kadar akılda kalıcı olamsada Columbia da gene atmosferi bakımından iyidir. Grafikleri yılına göre degerlendirince muazzam. Bioshock the collection indirime girince alın derim.

переоценена. графен мыльный, стоит только самою малость отклониться от траектории основного сюжета. 
сам сюжет представляет из себя примитивнейшую реализацию идеи мультивселенского парадокса со скучнейшими персонажами и событиями. гейсплей ужасен. мало того, что игра не предлагает по факту никаких оригинальных, цепляющих механик, и это банальный тир тока с фаерболами, так еще и физика стрельбы абсолютно неприятна, когда от бедра ты не попадешь ни во что, а прицельный огонь так косит мушку, что тихий ужас. единственное, что было хорошего, так это Элизабет. но и её, как персонажа, по факту угробили наитуйпейшей концовкой, сведя на нет все, что в ней привлекало ИМХО.  чисто визуально цепляет, а так брехня на постном масле. 4/10

Ingredientes
para 1 docena de empanadas
12 tapas para empanadas
1/2 kg. de carne picada
1 cebolla
2 dientes de ajo
1/2 pimiento morrón rojo
1 tomate
2 cdas. de puré de tomates
1 puñado de aceitunas
Receta de empanadas de carne
jugosas y riquísimas!
En una olla con aceite caliente agregar la cebolla y el morrón. Dejar dorar unos minutos y cuando estén a medio cocer, agregar el ajo y un poco de sal.
Subir el fuego y agregar de una toda la carne picada. Mover la carne para que no quede pegada. Cuando la carne esté sellada agregar el tomate en cubos y las 2 cdas de puré de tomates. Condimentar y mezclar bien. Tapar (no del todo) #TapaEnChanfle y dejar cocinar una media hora revolviendo de a poco.
Sacar del fuego y dejar enfriar en la olla. Agregar las aceitunas picadas y mezclar bien. (En este paso pueden agregar cualquier otra cosa que le quieran poner: huevo duro, pasas, papa, etc)
Repartir el relleno en las tapas de empanada, y cerrar con un repulgue. Acá les dejo un video con los distintos tipos de repulgue.
Poner nuestras empanadas de carne en una placa y llevar a horno fuerte hasta que estén doradas!

一座灯塔，一个男人，一座城市，一个故事，如果早知不能带你去巴黎，我应该将那个坚强而善良的女孩留在沉船湾的海滩上起舞。

Серия игр Bioshock - это философия, сюжет, графика, глубокий (забавно) мир и живые герои. 
Достоинства данной части: 
- прекрасная графика (лучи, пейзажи, архитектура, дизайн);
- интересный сюжет с множеством неожиданных поворотов;
- увлекательная боевая система. 
Дополнения возвращают в привычные фанатам места, раскрывая сюжет оригинальной игры. 

Благодарен разработчикам за труд.
Bioshock infinite finis en 10 heures, pas tres long mais super ambiance et scenario , je recommande a tous de faire ce jeux sa change des autres FPS .

Great game!

This game could have been decent if it didn't label itself as a Bioshock game. Anything you love about Bioshock 1 or 2 is completely void in Infinite. If you like a:
  - Limited weapon selection with some becoming completely useless at higher difficulties
  - Worse health and ev- sorry, mana system compared to Bioshock 1 and 2
  - Randomized gear system that has stats arbitrarily attributed to different clothing items compared to Bioshock 1 and 2's 
  tonic system
  - System of combat that is reduced to waves of enemies in the same locations that does not incentivize movement 
  beyond sitting in one point, rather than scattering enemies throughout the map
  - Weapon upgrade system that promotes using the same two or three weapons without any variety (made very obvious 
  through the weapon achievements' global percentages)
  - Story that can be described as convoluted and plot hole ridden at best
  - Map designs that limit exploration with no incentive to explore outside the direct mission line given to the player
  - DLC that shall not be named
  - Troy Baker protagonist (derogative)
  - And worst of all, removal of telekinesis
Then you'll love Infinite.

Pros:
  - Music is cool
  - Scenery and graphics are neat
  - Songbird is cute

Muito top mano, joguei essa obra de arte que fecha a trilogia Bioshock e ainda tem a pegada de viagem entre dimensões.
O jogo é ótimo, história excelente que nos faz imergir na história, gameplay ótima comandos muito preciso e graficos 8/10, uma verdadeira obra de arte, valeu cada segundo.

Game-play is solid throughout, exploration is rewarded and combat is challenging in places but never a nightmare. Learn to head-shot early because there always seems to be loads of ammo, but never for the type of gun you're carrying, conservation is key. Story-line seems reasonably straightforward then gets real complicated real fast, pulling you through an emotional maelstrom while your brain turns to soup and falls out your ear. Enjoy :)

自己玩到结局的时候只是有种怅然若失的感觉，怀疑自己把安娜带走的决定是否正确。究竟是做一个被人用谎言精心呵护的笼中雀，还是做一个知晓真相面对既危险又复杂的现实的人呢？

不清楚为什么被称为神作，steam只能选推荐或不推荐，在我心中也就算及格吧，勉强点个推荐。画面可以，剧情可能还不错吧，反正我是没怎么看懂。最重要的是一个fps游戏，战斗做得真的不行，枪械手感只能说非常一般，战斗千篇一律，育碧打据点都比这个游戏的战斗好玩。地图做得太大了，尤其是室内，显得又大又空。关于中国人那段，避免被喷玻璃心，反正给我的印象只有减分没有加分。

One of my favorite games of all time. Love the graphics / art direction, the story and the characters, the voice dialogue and the music. Just make absolutely sure that you when you finish the game you stick around for the post-credits scene! The ending can be a bit confusing, especially if you missed a few voxophones (i.e. backstory recordings) along the way. The post-credits scene will make things a little more clear. The only thing I was disappointed with was the lack of combat customization and lack of it's impact on the gameplay. You're limited to only being able to hold two different guns, and the cost of upgrading them and your powers is very expensive. By the time you reach the end of the game you'll have only been able to fully upgrade about four of them. You also have four clothing items you can equip, but, all of their effects on combat are pretty lackluster and simple. Overall, none of these things have a big impact on the combat and therefore it feels like no matter what decisions you made they don't matter much. You'll be far more reliant on real-time skills rather than any strategy or planning you came up with prior to combat. This was my experience with the harder difficulties, and may be different from normal or easy difficultly.

The Bioshock Collection should be a part of any discerning gamer's library.  I happened to play Infinite, first, because I wasn't sure if I would like this style of game.  I loved it.  Story rich and excellent game play. Then, I went back and bought the whole collection.

A clear departure from the original two games, Infinite is a daring third game in the Bioshock series. There is a clear shift in terms of tone (e.g. no horror elements), but still delivers a breathtaking city, superpower/firearm hybrid combat, and an incredible story which are Bioshock hallmarks. 

Player characterization is something new to Infinite. The character that you play as is now voiced and has his own personality. While initially jarring due to the departure from the blank protagonist in previous Bioshock titles, Booker slowly grows on you as he becomes gradually more believable and relatable. The strongest point is Elizabeth, your companion throughout most of the game. She also delivers one of the most mind-boggling and heart-breaking plot twists in any game. 

A satisfying conclusion to the Bioshock series.
Un juego que realmente te coloca en la historia, perfecta conclusion para una saga.
